actions.text: Amendment SA 3009 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 49. Record Vote Number: 49.

Amendment SA 3009 proposed by Senator Nelson FL. (consideration: CR S2148-2152, S2178; text: CR S2148) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to protect medicare beneficiaries who enroll in the prescription drug benefit during 2006.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 3009 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 49. Record Vote Number: 49.
Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 3009 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 49 - 49. Record Vote Number: 49.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3009 proposed by Senator Nelson FL.

purpose: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to protect medicare beneficiaries who enroll in the prescription drug benefit during 2006.
